body_html: @oldmonk101 This bug (tell() raising an AttributeError if called before read() or write()) was present in all versions of TensorFlow up to 1.0.1, but is fixed in 1.1. Upgrading to the 1.1 release candidate or nightly version will fix the problem.
body_text: @oldmonk101 This bug (tell() raising an AttributeError if called before read() or write()) was present in all versions of TensorFlow up to 1.0.1, but is fixed in 1.1. Upgrading to the 1.1 release candidate or nightly version will fix the problem.
body: @oldmonk101 This bug (`tell()` raising an `AttributeError` if called before `read()` or `write()`) was present in all versions of TensorFlow up to 1.0.1, but is fixed in 1.1. Upgrading to the 1.1 release candidate or nightly version will fix the problem.
